Method.name: Map
Method.Description: read strings from MR.Base.Iterator and count words
Method.Implementation:
#dim id As %String = MapInput.GetNext() #dim o As MR.Sample.Person = ##class(MR.Sample.Person).%OpenId(id) quit:'$isobject(o)
// we prefix keys with numbers to make sure they will be retrieved // from the global pipe in the expected order do MapOutput.Emit(o.Age, "1Sum", o.Contacts) ; NB! autoincrement do MapOutput.Emit(o.Age, "2Count", 1) ; NB! autoincrement
